snippet: Ofer Biton, who helped direct hundreds of thousands of dollars from supporters of a revered rabbi to Representative Michael G. Grimm’s campaign, said he lied on his visa application.
abstract: Ofer Biton, former fund-raiser for Republican Rep Michael G Grimm of Staten Island, whose campaign finances are under investigation by federal prosecutors, pleads guilty to visa fraud.
lead_paragraph: Ofer Biton, who helped direct hundreds of thousands of dollars from supporters of a revered rabbi to Representative Michael G. Grimm’s campaign, said he lied on his visa application.

headline.main: Former Fund-Raiser for Grimm Pleads Guilty to Visa Fraud
